vote.title: Authorize (1) the acceptance of a grant from the U.S. Department of Homeland Security through the Federal Emergency Management Agency under the FY2020 Assistance to Firefighters Grant Program - COVID-19 Supplemental in the amount of $846,260.87 to prevent, prepare for, and respond to the coronavirus for the period July 3, 2020 through July 2, 2021; (2) the receipt and deposit of funds in an amount not to exceed $846,260.87 in the DHS FY 2020-Assistance to Firefighters Grant Program; (3) the establishment of appropriations in an amount not to exceed $846,260.87 in the DHS FY 2020-Assistance to Firefighters Grant Program; (4) a local cash match in an amount not to exceed $126,939.13; and (5) execution of the grant agreement - Total not to exceed $973,200.00 - Financing: U.S. Department of Homeland Security Assistance to Firefighters Grant Funds ($846,260.87) and General Fund ($126,939.13)
vote.description: Authorize (1) the acceptance of a grant from the U.S. Department of Homeland Security through the Federal Emergency Management Agency under the FY2020 Assistance to Firefighters Grant Program - COVID-19 Supplemental in the amount of $846,260.87 to prevent, prepare for, and respond to the coronavirus for the period July 3, 2020 through July 2, 2021; (2) the receipt and deposit of funds in an amount not to exceed $846,260.87 in the DHS FY 2020-Assistance to Firefighters Grant Program; (3) the establishment of appropriations in an amount not to exceed $846,260.87 in the DHS FY 2020-Assistance to Firefighters Grant Program; (4) a local cash match in an amount not to exceed $126,939.13; and (5) execution of the grant agreement - Total not to exceed $973,200.00 - Financing: U.S. Department of Homeland Security Assistance to Firefighters Grant Funds ($846,260.87) and General Fund ($126,939.13)
